_comment: Same meeting invitation appears differently on organizer vs attendee calendars
_source: Synthetic example based on API documentation
_critical_note: Same meeting has DIFFERENT event IDs on different calendars

organizer_view._comment: How the meeting appears on Alice's calendar (organizer)

attendee_view._comment: How the SAME meeting appears on Bob's calendar (attendee)

event_id._note: DIFFERENT - each calendar has its own event ID

calendar_id._note: Event is on attendee's PRIMARY calendar

iCalUID._note: SAME - use this to correlate across calendars

self_field._note: 'self: true' appears on different attendee depending on who queries

_how_to_correlate.method_1: Use iCalUID - same across all copies
_how_to_correlate.method_2: Match by organizer email + start time + summary
_how_to_correlate.warning: Do NOT assume event IDs match across calendars

_shared_calendar_different._comment: Contrast: Shared calendar (not invitation) uses SAME event ID
_shared_calendar_different._scenario: Alice shares her calendar with Bob
_shared_calendar_different._key_difference: Shared calendar = same ID, Invitation = different ID
